dcterms:creator: A. Warstadt
A. Singh
S. R. Bowman
dcterms:description: The Corpus of Linguistic Acceptability (CoLA) dataset contains 10,657 sentences, labeled by acceptability (grammaticality) and divided into public (open) and test (hidden) parts.
dcterms:title: Corpus of Linguistic Acceptability

dcterms:creator: A. L. Maas
R. E. Daly
P. T. Pham
D. Huang
A. Y. Ng
C. Potts
dcterms:description: The Large Movie Review Dataset v1.0 (IMDB) contains 50,000 movie reviews, labeled by sentiment: 'positive' or 'negative'.
dcterms:title: Large Movie Review Dataset v1.0

dcterms:creator: T. A. Almeida
J. M. G. Hidalgo
A. Yamakami
dcterms:description: The SMS Spam Collection v.1 (SPAM) is a public set of SMS (text) labeled messages collected for mobile phone spam research.
dcterms:title: SMS Spam Collection v.1
